title: looking for players to rank
body:
hi im looking for nice players to play rank with 
i usually carry u can search my kda on lolking over 50 games
i need players who dont feed and do ok
i use to be s1 but now a bronze trying to climb out hopefully you can help me :) 
also if you have skype or something to chat on thats a plus

replies.body: add me Im stuck in bronze 1 i was silver 3 in preseason and im comfortable playing sup,jg,top respectively and am open to comms (skype)

hey man,
it seems you are doing good with your champ
but you need to improve your cs. that seems low.
good news for you: you have rooms to improve

add me. I was S1 too (during last season, not pre-season 6), now S3 going up
pretty sure our champs can do good combo as I have done it before.
